metadata.description:
A two-issue limited series.

2215, the planet of Caldoria saw its population exterminated by an experimental Artificial Intelligence. Among the rare few survivors, Stan, a young boy, who has been living in isolation for over a year, discovers an industrial robot that strangely does not seem to obey the A.I.  Accepting it as a friend, Stan nicknames it “Rocky”, and together, they go searching for possible survivors...
metadata.name: Rock & Stone
